resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2828</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tools for Educators</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfsmittel für Erzieher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Outils pour des éducateurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ferramentas para educadores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strumenti per gli educatori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργαλεία για τους εκπαιδευτικούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Herramientas para los educadores</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A teachers site containing Free worksheets and links to tools to create various learning activities such as crosswords, listening tests, handouts etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning units</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning activities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crosswords</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stationieren Lehrer das Enthalten der freien Bogen
und der Links zu den Hilfsmitteln, um verschiedene Lernenaktivitäten 
wie Kreuzworträtsel, hörende Tests, Mitteilungsblätter usw. zu 
erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les professeurs situent contenir les tableaux 
libres et les liens aux outils pour créer la diverse étude telle que
les mots croisé, les essais d'écoute, les aumônes etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os professores situam conter folhas livres e 
ligações às ferramentas para criar várias atividades de 
aprendizagem tais como os crosswords, os testes escutando, os handouts
etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli insegnanti situano contenere i fogli di lavoro
liberi ed i collegamenti agli strumenti per creare le varie attività 
imparanti quali le parole incrociate, le prove ascoltanti, le dispense
ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια περιοχή δασκάλων που περιέχει τα ελεύθερες φύλλα 
εργασίας και τις συνδέσεις με τα εργαλεία για να δημιουργήσει τις 
διάφορες δραστηριότητες εκμάθησης όπως τα σταυρόλεξα, οι δοκιμές
ακούσματος, τα φυλλάδια κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los profesores localizan contener las hojas de 
trabajo libres y las conexiones a las herramientas para crear varias 
actividades que aprenden tales como crucigramas, pruebas que escuchan,
folletos etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenmaßeinheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenaktivitäten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unités d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mots croisé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidades de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividades de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crosswords</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità imparanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività imparanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parole incrociate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδες εκμάθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δραστηριότητες εκμάθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σταυρόλεξα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">educación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">unidades que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actividades que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">crucigramas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

          </identifier>
          <contribute>

        <educational>

          <typicalAgeRange>

          <description>

          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

        <classification>

            </taxon>
